subject: Relationships
title: The Loneliness Epidemic
description: A quick, practical guide to The Loneliness Epidemic.

hook.text: The US Surgeon General declared loneliness a public health crisis. It kills as many people as smoking.

buildup.text: One in three adults reports feeling lonely regularly. Among young adults aged 18-25, it's nearly one in two.

discovery.text: Loneliness triggers chronic inflammation, weakened immunity, and accelerated cognitive decline.

twist.text: You can be lonely in a crowd. Loneliness isn't about being alone â€” it's about feeling disconnected.

climax.text: Loneliness is the body's hunger signal for connection. Ignoring it is as dangerous as ignoring physical hunger.

punchline.text: Loneliness is the body's hunger for connection. Ignoring it is deadly.

quiz.question: What did the US Surgeon General declare about loneliness?
